loans.use: to buy corn and clothes wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de este hombre que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y evitar así cualquier contacto con la violencia social que tiene invadido en lugar donde reside, además desea salir de la pobreza dando lo mejor de sus capacidades, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgulloso de eso, se dedica a la venta de maíz de forma ambulante y desde su vivienda, ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es un hombre enérgico, emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy contento con el negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: The wish to get ahead is one of this man's biggest dreams. He lives with his family in a home they own. He wants to have a fresh start and avoid any contact with the crime that hs invaded the area where he lives. He also wants to get out of poverty, giving the best of his capabilities. It is one of the best decisions he has made and he is proud of it. He sells corn door to door and from his home. He already has a lot of customers who orefer him for the quality of his product, the accesible prices, and above all for the excellent service. He is an energetic, enterprising man who is dedicated to his work and who has a lot of goals he wants to achieve. He is working hard to have a better future and is happy with his business. In the last few weeks demand has gone up and that is why he wants to make an investment. That is why he is asking INTEGRAL for a loan that will allow him to buy corn wholesale. He has good credit references and is very responsible. He is sure he can pay off the loan and confident he will bring financial security to his home.

loans.use: to buy corn wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre las personas buscan superarse, no importa el momento en que lo hagan porque el motivo es salir adelante y construir un futuro mas prospero, es el caso de esta joven mujer, tiene grandes habilidades, es honesta, emprendedora y muy trabajadora, vive con su grupo familiar el cual es su principal fuente de inspiración, quiere ofrecerles una vida mejor alejada de la delincuencia que los rodea. Desde hace tiempo tiene un pequeño puesto de antojitos típicos, pastelitos, nuégados, enchiladas, papitas, entre otros, comercia todos los días y es muy conocida por las personas de la zona y gracias a su manera de atenderlos la prefieren. Desea comprar mayor cantidad de materiales y proveer mayor cantidad de sus deliciosos antojitos, pero no posee el capital suficiente para hacerlo, es por eso que solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito para la compra de maíz, verduras, carne, azúcar, etc. La joven posee un buen récord crediticio y cuenta con la satisfacción de que nunca le ha quedado mal a nadie. Agradece desde ya el apoyo que le brindan.-
texts.en:
People always want to advance themselves, no matter the situation in which they find themselves, because their motive is to get ahead and construct a more prosperous future. That is the case of this young woman who has grand abilities, is honest, enterprising and a very hard worker. She lives with her family group which is her principal source of inspiration, and wants to offer them a better life, evading the delinquency that surrounds them.

For some time now, she has had a small stand making and selling typical snacks, cakes, nougets, enchiladas, and potato chips, among other items. She works every day and is very well known among the zone's inhabitants, thanks to her manner of attending to their preferences. 

She wants to purchase a larger quantity of supplies and to sell more of her delicious snacks, but she lacks sufficient capital to do so. It is for this reason that she is requesting a loan through INTEGRAL, to buy corn, vegetables, meat, sugar, etc.

This young woman possesses a good credit record and can count on the satisfaction of having never done anything bad to anyone. She is grateful for the help she has been offered in the past.

loans.use: to buy corn, vegetables, meat, and sugar, for making typical snacks to sell.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is a very devoted woman who has had several years of experience selling coconuts and makuti (palm fronds). She tells us that it has been a profitable business. Fatuma's aim is to continue to be in business so that she can have a more prosperous life. She is taking out this new loan to expand her business by adding additional stocks of coconuts and makuti for sale. In this way, she is sure that she will have good profits and move forward.

loans.use: to buy stock of coconuts and makuti (palm fronds) for resale.

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is 47 years old. He practices mixed-crop farming, and his farm is doing well. He has also been running a retail shop for the past fourteen years. 

He is applying for his fourth term loan from KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loans successfully. Richard will use the new loan to buy more stocks of sugar, rice, cooking oil and other consumer goods. With the anticipated profit from his business, he will build rental houses and increase his income. 

His hopes and dreams are to educate his children up to university level and improve the standard of living of his family.

loans.use: to buy sugar, rice, cooking oil and other consumer goods for his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia en una zona de alta incidencia delincuencial, desea no verse afectada por ella y quiere trabajar honestamente para ganarse un futuro mejor, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, pescado, camarones, conchas entre otros, comercia desde su hogar y de forma ambulante ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer activa, luchadora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero. Se siente muy contenta con el negocio pero sabe que necesita hacerlo crecer a fin de salir de la pobreza, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda, por lo que quiere realizar una mayor inversión en la compra de mercadería, por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mariscos por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The motivation to improve herself is one of the most important dreams of a woman who lives with her family members.  She lives in her own house in a zone with a high incidence of social violence and delinquency.  She does not want to see herself affected by it, and she wants to work honestly in order to earn a better future.  This is one of the better decisions she has made, and she is proud of this.

She sells shellfish, fish, shrimp, and scallops, among others.  She sells from her home and in an itinerant manner.  She has a lot of clientele who prefer her for the quality of the product, the accessible prices, and, above all, for the excellent service.  She is an active and tenacious woman who devotes herself to her work.  She has a lot of goals that she wishes to achieve.  She is working hard to meet these goals for a more prosperous future.

She is very happy with the business, but she knows that she needs to make it grow in order to get out of poverty.  In the last few weeks demand has increased, so she wants to make a bigger investment in buying merchandise.  This is why she is requesting a loan from Ingetral that will allow her to buy seafood wholesale.  

She has good payment references, and she is very responsible.  She affirms that she will be able to repay the debt, and she is confident that she will bring stability to her household.

loans.use: to buy seafood wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de salir adelante y ganarse un futuro mejor es el propósito mas importante de este hombre que quiere retomar su vida y alejarse de la delincuencia que lo rodea , él vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia y se dedica a la venta de mariscos, pescado, camarones y conchas. Ya tiene tiempo con la venta y posee amplia experiencia que le ayuda a generar muy buenas ganancias, es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefieren por la calidad de su producto, por los precios accesibles y por el servicio inigualable, siempre a la orden de los clientes, es un hombre luchador, dedicado a su labor y muy decidido a cumplir sus sueños, esta trabajando muy duro dia a dia para no decepcionar a su familia y ser su ejemplo a seguir, se siente contento y muy cómodo con su negocio y quiere mantenerlo a flote por eso le solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar mariscos por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es responsable, se compromete a cancelar la deuda y a la vez confía que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
This man has a strong will to prosper and his main goal is to have a better future and start a new life away from the delinquency surrounding him. He owns a house where he lives together with his family.

He has been selling shellfish, fish, shrimp and conches for a long time and he has lots of experience, which is why he makes good profits. He is well-known among people in his community and he has made many customers that prefer his products because of their quality and affordable prices, and because he listens to his customers and his service has no equal.

He is a fighter; a man committed to his labor and determined to make his dreams come true. He works hard every day in order not to disappoint his family and to be a role model. He feels glad and comfortable with the business he has and wants to continue working to keep it afloat. This is why he is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL in order to buy seafood in bulk. He has good references and he is responsible. He promises to pay the loan and he is confident that he will provide his family with economic stability.

loans.use: to buy seafood in bulk.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Personas con deseo de superación hay muchas y una de ellas es esta mujer, ya que con esfuerzos ha logrado posicionarse y alcanzar lo que hasta hoy a logrado, es muy trabajadora, positiva y emprendedora. Vive junto a su familia que es su mayor ilusión y cada mañana se levanta con deseos de darles lo necesario para tengan un futuro prospero alejado de la influencia de delincuencia que los rodea. Piensa que nunca es tarde para dar lo mejor de si y nunca ha decaído con sus ideas. Actualmente se dedica a la venta de bebidas agua natural, gaseosas y jugo entre otros, comercia desde su residencia es muy conocida y las personas la buscan por los buenos precios y el excelente servicio, últimamente aumento la demanda y necesita de mas producto, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así comprar bebidas por mayor. Tiene buenas referencias de pago, es responsable y con la ayuda de Dios espera que pronto pueda saldar la deuda que le aprueben, y confía que llevará a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
There are many people who wish to improve themselves, and one of them is this woman. Through her efforts, she has managed to position herself in the market and achieve what she has to date. She is very hard-working, positive and enterprising.

She lives with her family, the source of her greatest hope.  Each morning she gets up with the desire to give them what they need, so that they can have a prosperous future, far from the influence of the crime that surrounds them. She thinks that it's never too late to give the best of one's self and has never let herself get discouraged.

Currently, she works selling drinks such as bottled water, soft drinks, juice and other items. She sells from her home, is very well-known, and people seek her out for the good prices and excellent service. 

Lately demand has increased and she needs more merchandise. That is why she approached Integral to apply for a loan, so that she can buy drinks at wholesale. She has good payment references, is responsible, and with God's help, hopes she will soon be able to pay off the loan that is being approved. 

She is confident that she will bring financial security to her small household.

loans.use: To buy drinks at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Esta mujer con deseos de salir adelante, vive en una localidad con alta violencia social y espera cambiar esta realidad para sus hijos en un futuro cercano, para que así ellos no sufran la influencia de la delincuencia, por eso se levanta cada día para brindarles lo mejor de ella, es muy conocida en la zona de residencia por su humildad y su entrega al trabajo, nunca se ha dejado vencer y siempre ha salido adelante con sus dificultades. Con esfuerzo y dedicación posee una tienda en la que vende productos de primera necesidad granos básicos, leche, huevos, arroz entre otros, es muy dedicada a su labor y muy servicial a la hora de vender, es por eso que posee clientes que la buscan y la prefieren por sus productos. Se ha visto en la necesidad de surtir un poco mas la tienda debido al aumento de demanda y no tiene el capital para realizarlo, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar más productos como granos básicos producto instantáneo, golosinas, bebidas, etc. Confía en Dios de que pronto la ayuda solicitada, será otorgada, y no tendrá más preocupación que llevar el sustento diario a su hogar.
texts.en:
This is a woman who has a strong desire to get ahead.  She lives in a town that has a lot of societal violence, and she hopes to change this reality for her children in the near future so that they will not suffer from the impact of crime.  To do this, she gets up every day to provide the best for them.  She is well-known in her neighborhood for her humility and her dedication to her work.  She never gives up, and always forges ahead in spite of the difficulties she faces.  Due to her effort and dedication, she has a store where she sells consumer staples such as grains and other basic foods, milk, eggs, rice, among others.  She is very dedicated to her work, and very helpful to her customers when she is selling.  This is why she has customers who seek out her business and prefer her products.  

She has seen the need to stock up her store because of an increase in demand, and she lacks the capital to do this.  Therefore, she approached INTEGRAL to request a loan to buy products such as grains and basic products, instant products such as soups and drink mixes, snacks, drinks, etc.  She trusts in God that the help that she has requested will soon be granted, and that she will not have to worry anymore about providing for the daily needs of her household.

loans.use: to buy grains and other basic foods, instant products such as soups, and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Mujer con muchos éxitos y fracasos pero con la idea de mejorar su vida y la de su familia. Ella reside con su grupo familiar en zona con alta violencia social del país, día a día debe lidiar con ella para no verse arrastrada y afectada por la situación; su familia es la razón de que ella se esmere para brindarles lo mejor. Se dedica a vender ropa camisas, pantalones, vestidos entre otros, tiene varios años con el negocio y se ha hecho de experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener buenas ganancias,  tiene clientela que la busca por el buen servicio y por la variedad de ropa. Actualmente ella tiene el deseo de mejorar su puesto y es por eso que humildemente se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así poder comprar ropa por mayor. Esta segura que con la ayuda recibida podrá brindarle un mejor futuro a su familia y también confía en Dios que pronto saldará la deuda adquirida. Agradece de antemano la ayuda que recibirá, cuenta con la satisfacción de que es muy capaz de realizar todo aquello que se proponga.
texts.en:
A woman with many successes and failures too but firm in the intention of improving her and her family’s lives.  She lives with her family unit in an area of the country with high social violence.  She must deal with it day to day in order not to be dragged under and be affected by the situation.  She always strives to give her family the best.  

She sells clothes: shirts, pants and dresses, among others.  She’s had the business for several years and has gained sales experience that makes it possible for her to earn good profits.  She has customers that seek her out because of the good service and the variety of clothes.

She currently wants to improve her sales stand which is why she humbly approached Integral to request a loan to buy clothes at wholesale.  She is sure that with the support received she will be able to provide a better future for her family and she also trust in God that she will be able to repay the debt she’s taken on quickly.  She gives thanks in advance for the support she’ll receive.  She states with satisfaction that she’s quite capable of attaining everything she proposes.

loans.use: to buy clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo y motivación de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes, vive junto a su grupo familiar muy bien consolidado, él se dedica a la compra y venta de cartón de reciclaje; compra a clientes pequeñas cantidades hasta recolectar un grupo númeroso de éste y luego vende a empresas que lo recolectan, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en la labor lo que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor, todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos caminos y alejado de la violencia social, de la que es victima la localidad donde vive, todos los días se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar cartón por mayor. El  joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
One of his most important dreams is his wish and his motivation to improve himself.  He lives with his very well-formed family unit.  He buys and sells recyclable cardboard.  He buys small amounts from customers and when he has amassed a considerable quantity sells it to firms that collect it.  He’s been in business for some time now and he’s gained valuable work experience that makes it possible for him to earn the best profits.  He’s very well-known among local residents and he has quite a few regular customers who prefer him for his good prices and excellent service.  He’s an enterprising man who is dedicated to his work.  He strives daily to attain a better future with new paths that are far from social violence which he’s victim of where he lives.  He strives to the maximum degree every day because he’s happy with his work and does not want to disappoint his family.

Demand for the product has increased in recent weeks and he needs to make a new investment which is why he’s asking Integral for a loan to buy cardboard at wholesale.  The young man has good payment references and is very responsible.  He assures that he’ll be able to repay the loan while at the same time hopes to provide his small home with economic security.

loans.use: to buy cardboard at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de esta mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y evitar así cualquier contacto con la delincuencia que tiene invadido el lugar donde reside, además desea salir de la pobreza dando lo mejor de sus capacidades, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a realizar trabajos de cosmetóloga de forma ambulante, planchados, cortes, maquillajes entre otros, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad de su trabajo, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchos sueños que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero, se siente muy contenta con su trabajo. En las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión para mejorar la eficacia y calidad por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar un equipo de secado y una maquina para cortar cabello. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez  que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
One of this woman’s greatest dreams is her desire for self-improvement.  She lives with her family group in a house of her own.  She wants to have a new beginning and avoid any contact with the violence that’s been invading her neighborhood.  She also wants to rise out of poverty by means of her best efforts. This is one of the best decisions she’s ever made and she’s proud of it.

She provides cosmetology services like hair straightening, haircuts and make-up, among others from place to place and already has a good regular clientele that prefers her because of the quality of her work, her affordable prices and above all her excellent service.  She’s an active, enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and with many dreams to reach is working hard to attain a more prosperous future.  She feels very happy with her work.

Demand has increased in recent weeks so she wants to make a new investment to increase efficiency and quality which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy hair drying equipment and an electric hair clipper.  She has good payment references and is very responsible.  She assures that she’ll be able to repay the loan while at the same time providing economic security for her home.

loans.use: to buy hair drying equipment and a hair clipper.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es una mujer muy emprendedora, su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia queriendo tener nuevos horizontes y olvidarse de la delincuencia. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esmera día a día, muy trabajadora y desde hace un tiempo se dedica a vender antojitos típicos: enchiladas, papitas, pastelitos fritos rellenos de carne de res, entre otros,  tiene varios años de dedicarse a este trabajo y se siente orgullosa porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados, comercia de forma ambulante y desde un puesto enfrente de su vivienda. Es muy conocida y tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por calidad, precios y buen servicio; con éstos ingresos ella les brinda el pan de cada día para que nos les falte nada en el hogar. Su deseo es tener mejores beneficios para que el día de mañana les entregue lo mejor a su hijo que tanto la admira por su entrega a la labor. Ella tiene la convicción de que si aumenta su producción así aumentarán las ventas, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL para solicitar un crédito y así comprar maíz, carne, verduras, etc. Agradece la colaboración que recibirá y confía en Dios que nunca la abandonará para ya no verse influenciada por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupada en obras buenas como éstas y así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo correcto para ellos.
texts.en: She’s a very enterprising woman whose greatest wish is to provide a better future for her family; she wants to have new horizons and forget about crime.  She strives daily for her family group.  She’s very hardworking and has been selling traditional fast-food snacks like enchiladas, fried potatoes, and fried, beef-filled turnovers, among others for some time now.  She’s been in business for several years and is proud because she’s attained good results.  She sells from place to place and in a stand in front of her house.  She’s very well-known and has a large clientele that prefers her for the quality, prices and good service.  With this income  she’s able to provide her home with daily bread and see that nothing is lacking at home.  Her wish is to earn higher profits so that in future she will be able to give the very best to her son who so admires her for her dedication to work.  She is convinced that if production increases so will sales and this is why she approached Integral to request a loan to buy corn, meat, vegetables, etc.  She is grateful for the collaboration she’ll get and trusts in God that He’ll never abandon her so that she will no longer be influenced by bad companions and to always stay busy doing good works like these to better watch over her family and set a good example for them.

loans.use: to buy corn, meat and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Las ganas de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia en una zona de alta incidencia de violencia social y delincuencia, desea no verse afectada por ella, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, ella posee un taller de costura donde confecciona todo tipo de prendas de vestir: camisas, vestidos, faldas, blusas, entre otros, ya tiene un buen tiempo con el negocio y es muy conocida en la zona, comercia desde su hogar y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer activa, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas próspero. Se siente muy contenta con el negocio pero sabe que necesita hacerlo crecer a fin de salir de la pobreza, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda, por lo que quiere realizar una mayor inversión en la compra de materia prima necesaria para la producción de ropa por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar tela por mayor, hilos, cierres, etc. Tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevará a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The desire for self-improvement is one of this woman’s most important dreams.  She lives with her family group in her own house in a zone with a high incidence of social violence and crime.  She does not want to be affected by it and this is one of the best decisions she’s made and is proud of it.

She has a sewing workshop where she makes all types of clothes: shirts, dresses, skirts and blouses, among others.  She’s been in business for some time now and is very well-known in the zone.  She sells from home and has many customers who prefer her for the quality of her products, her affordable prices and above all the excellent service.  She’s an active, enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work and who has many goals to reach.  She’s working hard to attain a more prosperous future.  She feels happy with her business because she knows she must work in order to rise out of poverty.

Demand has increased in recent weeks so she wants to make a new investment and buy raw materials needed to make the clothes which is why she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy fabric at wholesale, thread, zippers, etc.  She has good payment references and is very responsible.  She assures that she’ll be able to repay the loan while at the same time has faith that she’ll bring economic security to her home.

loans.use: to buy fabric at wholesale, thread and zippers.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Hombre con muchos éxitos y fracasos pero siempre con la idea de mejorar su vida y la de su familia. El reside con su grupo familiar en una zona con alta violencia social del país, día a día debe lidiar con ella para no verse arrastrado y afectado por la difícil situación; su familia es la razón de que se esfuerce por que solo asi podrá brindarles lo mejor. Se dedica a vender verduras, cebollas, tomates, chiles, papas, entre otros, desde hace ya algún tiempo, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que lo prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el excelente servicio. Actualmente tiene el deseo de mejorar su puesto de verduras y es por eso que se acerco a INTEGRAL solicitando un crédito y así poder comprar verdura por mayor a fin de obtener mayores ganancias porque se adquieren a mas bajo precio de esa forma. Esta seguro que con la ayuda recibida podrá brindarle un mejor futuro a sus hijos y también confía en Dios que pronto saldará la deuda adquirida. Agradece de antemano la ayuda que recibirá, cuenta con la satisfacción de que es muy capaz de realizar todo aquello que se proponga.
texts.en:
A man with many successes and failures too but always with the idea of improving his and his family’s life.  He lives with his family group in an area of the country with a high incidence of social violence.  He must deal with it every day in order to avoid being swept away by it and affected by the difficult situation.  His family is the reason he strives because it’s the only way to be able to give them the best.

He sells vegetables: onions, tomatoes, chilies and potatoes, among others.  He’s been in business for some time now and has a large clientele that prefers him for the quality of his product, the good prices and the excellent service.  

He’d like to improve his vegetable stand which is why he approached Integral to request a loan to buy vegetables at wholesale in order to earn higher profits because they can be bought for lower prices that way.  He’s sure that with the support provided he’ll be able to provide a better future for his children.  In addition, he trusts in God that he’ll be able to repay the acquired debt quickly.  He gives thanks in advance for the help he’ll get.  He states with satisfaction that he’s capable of attaining whatever he proposes for himself.

loans.use: to buy vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Las ganas y la motivación de superarse es uno de los sueños mas grandes de una joven mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, granos básicos, leche, huevos, entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la tienda es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefieren por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer emprendedora, dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejada de la delincuencia, de la que es victima la localidad en que vive, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, producto instantáneo, golosinas, pan, bebidas, etc. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez confía que podrá llevar a su hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The drive and the motivation for self-improvement is one of this young woman’s greatest dreams.  She lives with her family group and has a grocery store where she sells basic staples like basic grains, milk and eggs, among others.  She’s been in business for some time now and has gained valuable sales experience that leads to the best profits.  The store is very well-known among local residents and she has a large clientele that prefers her for the quality of her products, the good prices and excellent service.

She’s an enterprising woman who is dedicated to her work.  She strives daily to attain a better future with new horizons that are away from the crime she’s been victimized by where she lives.  She strives to the maximum every day and is happy with her work and does not want to disappoint her family.

Demand for her goods has increased recently and she needs to make a new investment which is why she’s requesting a loan from Integral to buy basic grains, instant products, snacks, bread, beverages, etc.  The young woman has good payment references and is very responsible.  She’s sure she’ll be able to repay the debt while at the same time trusts that she’ll be able to provide economic security for her home.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay momentos duros y difíciles en la vida pero el deseo de superación siempre se nos presenta para asi buscar un futuro mejor. Esta mujer  es un claro ejemplo de ello, vive junto a su compañero de vida, y  tienen la mejor intención de cumplir sus metas y nunca dejarse vencer por las adversidades que se les presenten, aunque estén rodeados de una fuerte violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en la que viven. Es una mujer muy trabajadora y honesta con buenas relaciones en el lugar de residencia. Ella se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras, tomates, cebollas, chiles, plátanos, naranjas, entre otros, es muy conocida, comercia desde su vivienda y poco a poco se ha hecho de clientes que la prefieren y es por eso que desea comprar más mercadería. Lamentablemente no tiene el capital suficiente para esta inversión, es por eso que se acercó a INTEGRAL a solicitarle un credito para la compra de frutas y verduras por mayor. Agradece la ayuda que espera recibir, asegura que cancelará la deuda y a la vez confía que le dará a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
There are always hard and difficult moments in life but the desire for self-improvement always arises in order to seek a better future.  This woman is a clear example of this.  She lives with her life companion and they are best motivated to reach their goals and not be defeated by adversities that arise even though they are surrounded by extreme social violence that hammers the zone they live in.

She’s a hardworking, honest woman who has good relationships in her neighborhood.  She sells fruit and vegetables like tomatoes, onions, chilies, bananas and oranges, among others.  She’s very well-known and she sells from home.  She’s gradually attained customers who prefer her which is why she’d like to buy more merchandise.  Unfortunately, she does not have sufficient capital to make this investment which is why she approached Integral to request a loan to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.  She is grateful for the support she hopes to get and assures that she’ll repay the loan while at the same time is confident that she’ll provide her family with better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables at wholesale.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en: Francis is a 28-year-old married man. He has three children. He describes himself as a humble and caring man. He operates a store where he provides transportation. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a busy, fast-growing urban center, and his primary customers are local residents . He describes his biggest business challenge as insecurity in the area. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a motorcycle. His business goal is to diversify his business into rental houses within five years. He hopes to expand his business in the future. He previously took out a loan of Kes 20,000, which he managed to repay successfully.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy scissors, cosmetics, and dryers

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de un joven que vive junto a su grupo familiar, el posee un ciber café donde presta un servicio de internet muy eficaz y rápido, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, el ciber café es muy conocido por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que lo prefiere por los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es un hombre emprendedor, dedicado a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejado de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esta esforzando al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda pues cada vez hay mas personas que necesitan de esta tecnología, pero para mantener el buen servicio necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso  solicita  un crédito que le permita comprar impresoras, escritorios, teclados, pantallas, para innovar su negocio. El joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, se siente muy motivado por la oportunidad y asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The desire to improve his situation is a very important dream for this young man who lives with his family.  He has a cyber cafe where he provides very efficient, fast Internet services.  He has been in business for quite some time, which has given him valuable experience and allowed him to obtain better earnings.  The cyber cafe is very well-known by the local people; and he has been able to attract many customers who prefer his low prices and excellent service.

He is an entrepreneur dedicated to his work, struggling every day to carve out a better future with new horizons and far away from the social violence which victimizes the town he lives in.  He works to fullest capacity every day because he is happy in his job and does not want to disappoint the family.  Lately he has noticed an increase in demand because more and more people are in need of this technology; but in order to maintain the good service level, he needs to make a new investment.  Therefore he is requesting a loan to buy printers, desks, keyboards and monitors to renovate the business.

This young man has a good credit record and is very responsible.  He is very motivated by this opportunity and is committed to paying back the loan on time, while hoping to be able to provide his small household with economic security.

loans.use: To buy printers, desks, keyboards and computer monitors.

loans.name: Agnes

texts.en:
Agnes, 21, is a farmer in Kisii County in Kenya, where she lives with her husband and her two children who are both in school. She has been farming for five years, producing maize and milk, which she sells to the people around her local area.

She is requesting a 31,200 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to buy a dairy cow and insure it, which will help in growing her business, increasing her income and improving her standard of living, as well as enabling her to pay her children's school fees.

Financial constraints, pests, and diseases are some of the challenges she is facing in farming.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables, meats and condiments.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wholesale vegetables and underwear.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase meat, basic grains, vegetables, and drinks

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de tortillas, ya tiene tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias,  comercia desde su vivienda y es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y sobre todo por el servicio excelente; es una mujer luchadora, dedicada a su labor todos los días se esfuerza por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos caminos y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que reside, día a día se esmera al máximo pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar maíz por mayor, leña, etc. La joven esta entusiasmada y agradecida anticipadamente con el apoyo, tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la confianza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en:
The desire to improve her situation is an important dream for this young woman who lives with her family.  She sells tortillas and has been in business for some time, which has given her valuable sales experience and the ability to increase her earnings.  She works from home and is very well-known in her town.  She has many customers who prefer her quality product, low prices and excellent service.

She is a hard-working woman who is very dedicated to her activity, making every effort on a daily basis to carve out a better future with new horizons, far away from the social violence that smites the town she lives in.  She works as hard as she can every day because she is happy with what she does and would not want to disappoint the family.  

Lately, she has noticed a rise in product demand and needs to make a new investment.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy wholesale maize, firewood, etc.  This young lady is very enthusiastic and grateful in advance for the support.  She has a good credit record and is very responsible, promising to pay back the loan.  She trusts she will be able to provide her small household with economic security.

loans.use: To buy wholesale maize and firewood.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy wholesale skirts, blouses, t-shirts, socks and pants.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre hay momentos duros y difíciles pero aun asi las personas siempre tienen el deseo de superarse, es el caso de esta mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar, quiere tener un nuevo comienzo y evitar así cualquier contacto con la violencia social que tiene invadido en lugar donde reside, además desea salir de la pobreza dando lo mejor de sus capacidades, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de carne y chorizo de res y cerdo, ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer decidida, emprendedora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchos sueños que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas próspero, se siente muy contenta con el negocio, en las últimas semanas aumento la demanda por lo que quiere realizar una nueva inversión, por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar carne y chorizo por mayor a fin de hacer crecer su negocio. Esta entusiasmada con el apoyo, sabe que tiene buenas referencias de pago y asegura que podrá saldar la deuda, a la vez confía que llevará a su hogar una vida plena que tenga todo lo que se merecen.
texts.en:
Even though there are hard, difficult times in life, people always have a desire to get ahead.  This is the case of this woman who lives with her family and wants to have a new beginning, avoiding any contact whatsoever with the social violence that has invaded the area where she lives.  She also wants to climb out of poverty and work her hardest using her skills.  It is one of the best decisions she has made for which she feels proud.

She sells beef and pork meat and sausage and has many customers who prefer her quality products, low prices, and above all, the excellent service she provides.  She is a determined, enterprising woman who is very dedicated to her work, with many goals to achieve.  She is working hard to reach a more prosperous future and is happy with her business.  Lately, she has noticed an increase in demand and wants to make a new investment.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy wholesale meat and sausage to expand her business.  She is enthusiastic about the support and knows she has a good credit record and is committed to paying back the loan on time.  She is also confident she can provide her household with a life full of everything the family deserves.

loans.use: To buy wholesale beef and pork meat and sausage.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: El deseo de superarse es uno de los sueños mas importantes de una mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar en casa propia en una zona de alta incidencia delincuencial, desea no verse afectada por ella y quiere trabajar honestamente para ganarse un futuro mejor, es una de las mejores decisiones que ha tomado y se siente orgullosa de eso, se dedica a la venta de mariscos, pescado, camarones, conchas entre otros, comercia en una zona que catalogo como buena y muy estratégica para la venta, se ha hecho de mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, por los precios accesibles y sobre todo por el servicio excelente, es una mujer con potencial, luchadora, dedicada a su labor, y con muchas metas que desea lograr, esta trabajando duro por alcanzar un futuro mas prospero. Se siente muy contenta con el negocio pero sabe que necesita hacerlo crecer a fin de ganar mas, en las últimas semanas ha aumentado la demanda, por lo que quiere realizar una mayor inversión en la compra de mercadería, por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar mariscos por mayor. Esta muy satisfecha con el apoyo, sabe que tiene buenas referencias de pago, asegura que podrá saldar la deuda y a la vez tiene fe que llevara a su hogar una mejor calidad de vida como se la merecen.
texts.en:
A desire for self-improvement is one of the most important goals for this woman who lives with her family in their own house in an area with a high crime rate.  She does not want this to affect her because she wants to earn an honest living to have a better future.  It is one of the best decisions she had made, for which she feels proud.  She sells seafood, fish, shrimp, and molluscs in a very strategic sales point.  She has many customers who prefer her quality products, low prices and, above all, excellent service.  She is a woman with a lot of potential, and a very hard-working, dedicated person with many goals to be met.

She is working hard to have a more prosperous future and is happy with her business but knows she must expand to earn more.  Lately, she has noticed an increase in demand and wants to make a larger investment to buy more merchandise.  Therefore she is requesting a loan to buy wholesale seafood.  She is satisfied with this support, knowing she has a good credit record and is committed to paying back the loan on time.  She is also confident she will be able to provide her household with a lifestyle the family deserves.

loans.use: To buy wholesale seafood.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Es un hombre emprendedor con deseos de superación y con muchas posibilidades de hacer algo grande con su vida, su mayor deseo es entregarle un mejor futuro a su familia buscando tener nuevos horizontes y olvidándose de la delincuencia que los rodea. Tiene un grupo familiar por el cual se esfuerza día a día, es muy trabajador y desde hace un tiempo se dedica a la confección de diferentes prendas de vestir, tiene varios años de dedicarse a este trabajo y se siente orgulloso porque ha logrado que le dé buenos resultados,  su taller de costura es muy conocido y ya tiene mucha clientela en un lugar que identifico como muy bueno para desarrollar sus actividades; su meta es tener mejores beneficios que le ayuden a cumplir sus sueños. Él tiene la convicción de que si aumenta su producción así aumentarán las ventas, es por eso que se acerca a solicitar un crédito que le permita comprar tela en variedad al por mayor, cierres, hilos, botones, etc. Agradece la colaboración que recibirá además tiene esperanza en Dios que no lo abandonará para ya no verse influenciado por malas compañías y estar siempre ocupado en obras buenas como ésta, para así velar de la mejor manera por su familia y ser ejemplo correcto para ellos
texts.en: The borrower is an enterprising man with desires to succeed and many possibilities of doing something great with his life. His greatest desire is to bring his family a better future and he is seeking new horizons, trying to forget the crime around them.  His family strives every day and they are hard working.  He is a tailor and makes various types of clothing.  He has been in this business for several years and he feels proud because he has achieved good results.  His sewing workshop is well-known and he already has many customers in a location that has been identified as good for his business.  His goal is to have better benefits that will help him fulfill his dreams.  He is convinced that if he increases production, sales will increase.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan to purchase a variety of wholesale fabric, zippers, thread, buttons, etc.  He is grateful for the collaboration that he will receive.  In addition, he has faith that God will not abandon him, that he will not be influenced by bad company, and he will always be occupied with good works such as this so as to ensure the best for his family and be a good example for them.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of wholesale fabric, zippers, thread, buttons, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy animals and fruit to sell in the market.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow.

loans.name: Tabitha

texts.en:
Tabitha is age 22 and lives in Kisii County in Kenya, with her husband and one child, who is in school. Tabitha has been farming for five years, producing milk and vegetables, which she sells at a market in her area. She runs a hair salon as an additional source of income.

Tabitha is requesting a 52,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo, to buy and insure a dairy cow. The cow's milk will help her get extra income and improve her living standard, and she will be able to pay her child’s school fees with ease.

Financial constraint is her major challenge.

loans.use: to buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Ha tenido éxitos y fracasos pero aun asi el deseo de superarse siempre ha sido uno de los sueños mas importantes de una joven mujer que vive junto a su grupo familiar, ella se dedica a la venta de tamales en variedad de gallina, pollo, frijol, entre otros, ya tiene algún tiempo con el negocio y eso le ha regalado valiosa experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, la joven es muy conocida por las personas de la localidad y ya tiene mucha clientela que la prefiere por la calidad del producto, los buenos precios y el servicio excelente; es una mujer con gran potencial, decidida y dedicada a su labor todos los días lucha por conseguir un futuro mejor con nuevos horizontes y alejada de la violencia social de la que es victima la localidad en que habita, todos los días se esta esforzando al cien porciento, pues esta feliz con su trabajo y no quiere decepcionar a su familia, en las ultimas semanas aumento la demanda del producto y necesita realizar una nueva inversión por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar granos básicos, verduras, pollo, gallina, etc. La joven tiene buenas referencias de pago y es muy responsable, agradece desde ya el apoyo, asegura que podrá cancelar la deuda, y a la vez tiene la esperanza que podrá llevar a su pequeño hogar seguridad económica.
texts.en: She has had success and failure, but even so the desire to get ahead has always been one if this young woman's biggest dreams. She lives with her family and sells tamales made from chicken, beans and more. She has been doing this for some time and it has given her valuable experience in sales, allowing her to obtain better earnings. She is well known to the people in the area and has a lot of customers who prefer the quality of her product, the good prices and the excellent service. She is a woman with a lot of potential who is decisive and dedicated to her work. Every day she fights to have a better future with new horizons away from the crime which victimizes her where she lives. Every day she works 100%. She is happy with her work and doesn't want to dissapoint her family. In the last few weeks demand has increased and she needs to make a new investment. That is why she is asking for a loan that will allow her to buy basic grains, vegetables, chicken, etc. She has good payment references and is very responsible. She is already grateful for the support and confident she can pay off the debt. She hopes she will be able to bring financial security to her home.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: Siempre las personas buscan superarse, no importa el momento en que lo hagan porque el motivo es salir adelante y construir un futuro mas próspero, es el caso de esta joven mujer,  ella tiene grandes habilidades, es honesta, emprendedora y muy positiva, vive con su grupo familiar el cual es su principal fuente de inspiración, quiere ofrecerles una vida mejor alejada de la delincuencia que le rodea. Desde hace tiempo tiene un pequeño puesto donde vende ropa en variedad para damas, caballeros y  niños como camisas, blusas,  vestidos, pantalones entre otros, comercia todos los días y es muy conocida por las personas de la zona y gracias a su manera de atenderlos la prefieren además de la calidad de producto y los buenos precios. Desea comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería, pero no posee el capital suficiente para hacerlo, es por eso que solicita un crédito para la compra de ropa por mayor. La joven posee buenas referencias de pago y cuenta con la satisfacción de que nunca le ha quedado mal a nadie. Agradece desde ya el apoyo que le brindan y tiene fe en Dios que de ahora en adelante podrá darle a su familia la calidad de vida que tanto se merecen.
texts.en:
People try to succeed; it does not matter when they do it because what matters is to get ahead in life and to build a more prosperous future. This is the case of this young woman. She is very skilled, honest, enterprising and very positive-minded. She lives together with her family, which is her inspiration. She wants to offer them a better life, away from the crime surrounding them.

She has had a small store for some time now, where she sells different clothes for women, men and children, such as shirts, blouses, dresses and pants. She opens her store everyday and is well-known among local people, thanks to her good service and the quality and good prices of the products she sells.

She would like to buy more merchandise but lacks the capital needed. This is why she is requesting a loan in order to buy clothes in bulk. She has good references and can proudly say that she has never let anyone down. She appreciates in advance all the support she might get and truly believes that from now on she will be able to provide her family with the quality of life they so much deserve.

loans.use: to buy clothes in bulk, such as shirts, blouses, dresses and pants.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en:
Martha is 53 years old, married, and a mother of two children. She sells fruits and vegetables for a living, in Mpeketoni, Lamu. She earns a monthly income of about 17,000 KES. 

She was introduced to KADET LTD by one of our credit officers. Martha needed funds which she was lacking, in order to purchase additional stock for her business. She applied for a business loan of 60,000 KES from KADET LTD, to buy more stock of assorted fruits and vegetables for resale. Martha will use the anticipated profits to pay school fees for her children. 

She desires to grow her business and hopes that one day, she will come to own a well-established retail shop in the area.

loans.use: to buy more stock of assorted fruits and vegetables to resell

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en: Margaret is a married woman. She has 4 children with ages ranging from 3 years to 16 years. She describes herself to be a hard working woman. She operates a retail stall where she sells clothes. She has been involved in this business for 11 years. Her business is located within a busy market and her primary customers are local residents and passengers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high prices of the clothes. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more clothes to sell. Her business goal is to be a successful businesswoman within 5 years. She hopes that, in the future, she will be a distributor of clothes. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Geofrey

texts.en:
Geofrey is aged 21 and lives in Kisii County in Kenya, where he lives with his wife and one child, who is in school. Geofrey has been engaged in mixed farming for the past five years, producing maize and milk, which he sells in his locality. He runs a cybercafe as an additional source of income.

He is requesting a 62,400 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo, to buy and insure a dairy cow. Selling the cow's milk will raise his income and give him a better livelihood, as well as enable him to educate his child with some ease.

Geofrey aspires to have his own firm in the next five years. Stiff competition and financial constraint are his major challenges in agriculture.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Juana Dionisia

texts.es: Doña Juana de 50 años de edad, empezó a trabajar a los 25 años ahora se desempeña como asistente administrativa, es casada tienen tres hijos, estudia la carrera de licenciatura en derecho con cinco años de duración, ya solo le falta unos meses para ser profesional, por tal motivo solicita crédito para poder pagar su curso de titulación ya que su salario es muy bajo para cubrir este gasto de un solo, ella sueña culminar su carrera para ejercerla de manera exitosa para su beneficio el de su familia y a la comunidad.
texts.en: Juana, 50, started working at the age of 25 and is now employed as an administrative assistant.  She’s married and has three children.  She’s studying law, a five-year course program, and only has a few months left to become a professional which is the reason for her requesting a loan so that she can pay for her final course because her salary is too low to cover this expense all at once.  She dreams with completing her career and practice it successfully for the wellbeing of her family and her community.

loans.use: to pay for her final law school course.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Philip

texts.en:
Philip is a 48-year-old farmer in Kisii County in Kenya, where he lives with his wife and their eight children. Only two of the children are still in school. Philip has been farming for the past fifteen years, producing maize, beans and vegetables. He works as a mason for an additional source of income.

He is requesting a 36,400 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo, to buy and insure a dairy cow. Selling the cow's milk will give him extra income, which will assist him in paying school fees for his children and uplift his livelihood. He plans to purchase another parcel of land to grow Napier grass in the next five years.

Pests and diseases that affect crops and animals are his major challenges in farming. Philip is very grateful to Juhudi Kilimo for the support.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Nueva Oportunidad Group

texts.es:
Historia del BC
Este Banco Comunal se llama “Nueva Oportunidad” está conformado por 15 emprendedores quienes se dedican a diferentes rubros, entre los cuales se encuentran; venta de ropa, barraca, venta de herramientas, amasandería, tejidos, servicios entre otros. Todos ellos pertenecientes a la ciudad de Talca.
Elsa, integrante del grupo del Banco Comunal, quien en la foto se encuentra de pie en primera fila, ocupando el tercer lugar de derecha a izquierda, viste una polera de color café, su cabello es de color castaño oscuro y lo usa tomado.
Ella se dedica al rubro de venta de ropa y amasandería, desde hace 5 años. Comenta que trabaja de lunes a sábado y su horario lo distribuye de acuerdo a su disponibilidad, ofrece sus productos en su casa, donde cuenta con mucha clientela.
La mercadería e insumos que va necesitando los compra en supermercados y locales donde encuentra la harina a bajo costo, por lo tanto conveniente económicamente.
Con el crédito comprará mantequilla, harina, huevos, aceite, ropa en general.
Una de las metas de Elsa es seguir en el rubro y poder comprar un horno eléctrico industrial, para generar mayores ingresos, así con esto optar a una mejor calidad de vida.
Elsa vive junto a sus dos hijos de 14 años de edad y 10 meses de vida. Sus sueños a nivel personal y familiar es tener su casa propia, para darles un buen bienestar a sus hijos.
Ella se encuentra muy contenta y agradecida de la oportunidad brindada por Fondo Esperanza, ya que le permitirá invertir en su negocio. Respecto al grupo del Banco Comunal del cual forma parte, comenta que en éste existe muy buena comunicación. Por otro lado las capacitaciones, le han servido para aprender nuevas estrategias de venta y contabilidad.
Talca pertenece a la región del Maule, ubicada en la zona centro del país. Constituye el centro administrativo, económico y cultural de la región, siendo la ciudad más importante del Valle Central chileno. Sobre Talca existe una curiosa referencia en Chile, la frase "Talca, París, y Londres". Entre los mitos al respecto, algunos dicen que es una derivación de la originalmente dicha por un inglés "Talca parece Londres", por la abundante neblina que cubre frecuentemente la ciudad en la temporada invernal, a semejanza de la capital del Reino Unido.
texts.en:
This Communal Bank is named “Nueva Oportunidad” (New Opportunity) and consists of 15 entrepreneurs who engage in various trades such as selling clothing, managing a vending stall, selling tools, operating a bakery, weaving, providing services, and other activities. All of the members are from the city of Talca.

Elsa is a member of this Communal Bank group. In the photo, she is standing in the back row in the third position from right to left. She is wearing a coffee-colored blouse and has dark brown hair that is pulled back. Elsa has been selling clothes and managing a bakery for five years. She says that she works Monday through Saturday and her distribution schedule is determined by what she has available. Elsa offers her products from her house and she has many customers. The merchandise and supplies that she needs are purchased from supermarkets and shops that sell at low cost, which is financially convenient for her. She will use her loan to buy butter, flour, eggs, oil, and clothing.

One of Elsa’s goals is to continue her businesses and buy an industrial electric oven so that she can generate more income. This will help her achieve a better quality of life. Elsa lives with her two children, a 14-year-old and a 10-month-old. Her dreams for her family and for herself include owning a house so that she can provide for children’s welfare.

Elsa is very pleased and appreciative of the opportunity that Fondo Esperanza has given her. She says that there is good communication within the organization. With regard to the training, Elsa has learned new sales strategies and accounting techniques.

Talca is in the region of Maule and is located in the central part of the country. It is the administrative, economic, and cultural center of the region and is one of the most important cities in the Chilean Central Valley. One curious reference to Talca that is used in Chile is the phrase, “Talca, Paris, and London”. Some say that the phrase was originally attributed to an Englishman who said, “Talca feels like London” because of the abundant fog that frequently covers the city during winter, just like in the United Kingdom.

loans.use: to buy butter, flour, eggs, and oil as well as clothing to sell.

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea de 56 años de edad se dedica a la fabricación de productos desechables para uso sanitario, y de ropa quirúrgica para clínicas. Ella es una mujer casada, que tiene tres hijos en las edades de 19 a 27 años y que decidió crear su negocio hace 3 años, cuando estudiando administración de empresas,  la enseñaron a observar oportunidades de negocio desde las necesidades percibidas. Así fue que una  vez en un congreso al que asistió, encontró los servicios sanitarios en condiciones que le dificultaban su uso higiénico y decidió hacer su proyecto de grado en base a proteger a las la salud  de las mujeres mediante en los baños. Así nacieron los protectores de inodoros en telas quirúrgicas, y luego las vestidos y protectores de camas médicas que se usan en clínicas y hospitales. Su meta es lograr distribuciones masivas en nuevos supermercados, terminales de transporte aérea o terrestre y en diversos sitios de concurrencia publica, mediante dispensadores  a los que le ingresan dinero para su acceso. Sus ventas las realiza de contado diariamente y en su proceso de producción y comercialización trabaja  desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde.  En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, con el cual comprará 5 dispensadores para generar mayor volumen de ventas en sitios públicos d egran concurrencia, y con ello aumentar una vez más sus ingresos. Su meta mas adelante es cubrir la cota caribe y extenderse por toda Colombia con su producto que poco a poco asciende en sus ventas.
texts.en:
Andrea, 56, works manufacturing disposable sanitary products and surgical gowns for clinics.  She’s married and has three children whose ages range between 19 and 27 years.  She decided to create her business three years ago.  While studying business administration she was taught how to be on the lookout for business opportunities based on observed need.  

This is how it happened that on an occasion when she was attending a conference she found the bathroom facilities in such a state that it was difficult to use them hygienically and she decided to start her project based on protecting women’s health in public restrooms.  This was how the idea for toilet seat covers in surgical fabric was born which then led to gowns and hospital bed covers that are used in clinics and hospitals.  Her goal is to become a massive distributor via coin-operated dispensers to new supermarkets, to air and ground transportation terminals and various other sites where the public congregates.

Her sales take place daily and are cash and her production and sales process lasts from 8am until 6pm.  She’s applying for a Kiva loan to buy five dispensers to generate a higher sales volume in very busy public sites thus improving her income yet again.  Her goal for later on is to cover the Caribbean coast and then extend throughout Colombia with her product whose sale is increasing bit by bit.

loans.use: to buy five dispensers.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
Teresa is a farmer, aged 30 years, in Kisii County in Kenya.  She lives with her husband and their two children, who are both in school. She has been in farming for six years, producing maize, beans, and Napier grass, which she sells at the local market.

She is requesting a 52,000 KES loan from Juhudi Kilimo to buy and insure a dairy cow, which will help her venture into the dairy business and will provide extra income for her.  This will enable her to improve her livelihood and to educate her children. Teresa aspires to have six good-quality cows in the next five years.

Unpredictable weather conditions, pests and diseases are some of the challenges she is facing in farming. Teresa is thankful to Juhudi Kilimo for its financial support.

loans.use: To buy and insure a dairy cow

loans.name: Mercy

texts.en: Mercy is a 35-year-old married woman. She has 4 children with ages ranging from 3 years to 20 years. She describes herself to be a faithful, focused and goal-oriented woman. She operates a restaurant where she sells food, tea and snacks. She has been involved in this business for 3 years. Her business is located within a competitive business area and her primary customers are the local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy food ingredients to prepare meals to sell. Her business goal is to run a five-star hotel within 5 years. She hopes that in the future she will expand her business. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy food ingredients for preparing meals to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace is 24 years old and is married with three children from 2 to 9 years old. Her business is well organized, and she sells various goods such as lotions, soap, umbrellas and plastic shoes. Grace works from 7 a.m to 8 p.m every day of the week. She has six years of experience in this business and currently employs one person to help her.
 
Grace has requested a loan from Kiva lenders through Vision Finance Company to buy various goods such as lotions, soap, umbrellas and plastic shoes for resale. With the profit from this loan, she will be able to buy food for her family and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as lotions, soap, umbrellas and plastic shoes for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more sugar cane for resale.

loans.name: Cinthia Monica

texts.es:
Cinthia tiene 21 años de edad, vive en la ciudad de Ica, ciudad generosa con un clima cálido y acogedor, asimismo se desarrolla la agricultura en especial el cultivo de algodón, uva, esparrago, entre otros. Cinthia es una joven muy trabajadora, desde muy pequeña aprendió a ganarse el pan con el sudor de la frente ya que sus padres son personas de pocos recursos económicos y debido a ello tuvo la necesidad de trabajar para poder apoyarlos. 

Día a día Cinthia trabaja en un pequeño restaurante como mesera, ella labora alrededor de 9 horas al día y con el fruto de su trabajo puede apoyar con los gastos del hogar; ella cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy amable y responsable.

Cinthia esta muy agradecida con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá realizar mejoras en su vivienda como arreglar su techo ya que es de esteras, con lo cual podrá darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia y seguir luchando para poder hacer realidad su mas grande sueño:” Tener una carrera universitaria”.
texts.en:
Cinthia is 21 years old and lives in the city of Ica, a generous city with a warm and inviting climate.  Here farming is prevalent, especially the growing of cotton, grapes, asparagus and others.  Cinthia is a very hard working young woman.  At a very young age she has learned to earn her bread by the sweat of her brow, since her parents have few financial resources and for this reason she has had to work to help them.

Day in and day out Cinthia works in a small restaurant as a waitress.  She works about 9 hours a day and with her income she can help with the household expenses.  She believes that she is doing well at her work because she is kind and responsible.

Cinthia is very grateful to the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help that they provided her she will be able to make improvements to her home, such as fixing the the grass reed roof.  This way she will be able to provide a better quality of life to her family and continue to struggle to achieve her big dream of attending a university.

loans.use: to fix the roof.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline is 26 years old and a dairy and pig farmer. She is married to John, who is a mixed crop farmer. They are blessed with two children, aged six and three years. She has been in dairy farming as her primary business and pig rearing as her secondary business, for the past three years.  She earns a monthly income of 14,000 KES, which she uses to support her family. 

She is applying for her second loan with KADET LTD, after repaying the previous loan successfully. Caroline will use the new loan to buy pig feed, fertilizer and seedlings. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children and improve the living standard of her family. Her hopes and dreams are to be a large scale dairy and pig farmer.

loans.use: To buy pig feed, fertilizer and seedlings.

loans.name: Francis

texts.en:
Francis is 60 years old and married to Rosemary, a business lady. They are blessed with four grown children. He has been raising pigs for the past three years with a monthly income of KES 9,000, which he uses to support his family. 

He is applying for his first loan from KADET LTD after being introduced by a KADET customer. Francis will use the loan to buy pig feed. With the anticipated profit from the business he will educate his children. 

His hopes and dreams are to own a pig farm and venture into other businesses as opportunities arise.

loans.use: to buy pig feed.

loans.name: Olive

texts.en:
Olive is 35 years old and is married with three children. She sells various goods such as soap, lotions and sugar in a general store she operates from 6 a.m until 8 p.m every day except on Sunday. Olive has 10 years of experience in this business and she currently employs one person to help her.

Olive has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to buy various goods for resale. She plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy her family's basic needs, to save money for her future and to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy various goods such as soap, lotions and sugar for resale.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is a married man with 10 children ranging in age from 2 to 38 years. He describes himself as faithful. He operates a retail store where he sells plastic items such as basins, buckets, containers, etc. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. Samuel's business is located within a competitive business area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as insufficient funds for improving the business. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy plastic items. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years and he hopes that in the future, he will run a bigger retail shop. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy plastic items

loans.name: Mishi

texts.en:
Mishi is a married woman. She has four children and all are attending a primary school. Mishi operates a kiosk that serves the neighborhood. She has the urge to get ahead just like any other entrepreneur. 

She has worked in this business for two years. Mishi's other source of income includes income from her husband. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Mishi will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy more stock such as cooking oil, bags of sugar, bundles of maize and wheat flour. 

Mishi aspires to be a wholesaler in the future. She hopes to have good profits and provide a decent life to her children.

loans.use: to buy more stock such as cooking oil, bags of sugar, bundles of maize and wheat flour.

loans.name: Mayerlin

texts.es: Mayerlin  con su anterior credikiva compró cosméticos, productos capilares y artículos que llegaron con descuentos en sus catálogos; con esta compra logró cumplir los pedidos de sus clientes y hoy está muy entusiasmada en hacer otro credikiva, con el cual comprará artículos cosméticos y bisutería en genera, porque ha tomado en su preventa muchos pedidos, para dar respuesta durante el último trimestre del año, época en la cual se aumentan sus ventas y hacen que su inversión sea  muy exitosa. Su mensaje a los finaciadorsde Kiva es el siguiente: “Estoy muy agradecida por el apoyo que le dieron a mi negocio, espero que me continúen apoyando. “
texts.en: With the previous Kiva loan, Mayerlin purchased cosmetics, hair products and items that arrive with discounts from her catalogs. This purchase allowed her to fill her customers' orders and she is now very excited to be obtaining another Kiva loan.  She will buy cosmetics, and jewelry, as she has placed many orders to be delivered in the last quarter of the year, which is the period when her sales increase and make her investment successful.  Her message to the Kiva financial backers is " I am very grateful for the support that you gave me and my business, and I hope that you will continue helping me."

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and pieces of jewelry.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.en:
Daniel is 32 years old, married to Jacinta and a father of two children. He buys household items like food pots, vacuum bottles and net curtains in bulk and sells retail. He has been in this business for seven years and gets a monthly income of 16,000 KES.

This will be Daniel's second loan from KADET LTD. He plans to use the entire loan to buy blankets and food pots for resale. In the future, he wants to open a supermarket.

loans.use: to buy blankets and food pots for resale

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan is 32 years old, married to Joseph and blessed with five children who are all in school.

This is her first loan with KADET LTD. She operates her pig-raising business in Kiambu town. She has been in this business for the last three years and her monthly income is KES 26,000.

Susan wants to use the money to purchase pig feed and medicine. She will use the income to buy more pigs to raise. She desires to be a prosperous business woman.

loans.use: To purchase feed and medicine for the pigs.

loans.name: Vestine

texts.en:
Vestine is 34 years old and married with two children ages 3 and 11. Vestine also takes care of four relatives. She owns a welding business that she operates from 8 a.m. until 5 p.m. every day of the week except Sunday. She currently employs one person to help her and has five years of experience in this work. 

Vestine has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her welding business by buying machines and other materials for gaining more profit. She plans to use any profits generated from this loan to satisfy her family's basic needs and to reinvest in her business.

loans.use: To expand her welding business.

loans.name: Mwanakombo

texts.en: Mwanakombo is a married woman. She has five children who are all enrolled in school. Her husband works as a businessman. Mwanakombo operates a clothes selling business.
